originalTitle: Eighty kidnapped Nigerians return home after escape
title: Eighty kidnapped Nigerians return home after escape
content: They were among 177 people seized last month from three churches in northern Kaduna state.

originalTitle: South African singer Tyla edges out Davido to clinch Grammy
title: South African singer Tyla edges out Davido to clinch Grammy
content: The 24-year-old bagged her second-ever Grammy beating three Nigerians and a Ugandan.

originalTitle: Family seeks answers as Kenyan fighting for Russia killed in Ukraine
title: Family seeks answers as Kenyan fighting for Russia killed in Ukraine
content: Clinton Nyapara Mogesa is said to have been recruited in Qatar to fight for Russian forces in Ukraine.

originalTitle: Japan deep-sea hunt finds rare earths as it seeks to cut reliance on China
title: Japan deep-sea hunt finds rare earths as it seeks to cut reliance on China
content: Tokyo proclaims Pacific Ocean mission world’s first attempt to tap rare earths at such a depth.

originalTitle: In Gaza, my sister and nieces were my life. Israel killed them
title: In Gaza, my sister and nieces were my life. Israel killed them
content: Samia Alatrash recalls life before the war with her sister Samar and her two girls, and the night she lost her family.

originalTitle: China carries out further executions of Myanmar scam centre suspects
title: China carries out further executions of Myanmar scam centre suspects
content: Executions are part of broader crackdown by Beijing on scam centres across Southeast Asia built on an industrial scale.

originalTitle: Norway's PM agrees crown princess had 'poor judgement' over Epstein links
title: Norway's PM agrees crown princess had 'poor judgement' over Epstein links
content: Jonas Gahr Støre says he agreed with Princess Mette-Marit's own remarks over her contacts with the late sex offender.

originalTitle: 'Do you think you're the devil himself?' Epstein questioned in newly released interview
title: 'Do you think you're the devil himself?' Epstein questioned in newly released interview
content: The footage, which is part of millions of files released by the US Department of Justice, shows the late sex offender being questioned by an unnamed interviewer.

originalTitle: Syria's only female minister pushes for change: 'I'm not here for window dressing'
title: Syria's only female minister pushes for change: 'I'm not here for window dressing'
content: The BBC's Lyse Doucet follows Hind Kabawat as she confronts the challenges of fragmented, post-Assad Syria.

originalTitle: Jacquet set for Liverpool medical before £60m summer move
title: Jacquet set for Liverpool medical before £60m summer move
content: Liverpool agree a £60m deal with Rennes for defender Jeremy Jacquet, with the player set to join the Reds in the summer.

originalTitle: Fulham reject Everton's approach for Wilson
title: Fulham reject Everton's approach for Wilson
content: Fulham reject an offer from Everton for Harry Wilson, with the midfielder set to be out of contract this summer.

originalTitle: Celtic turn down Forest's £17m bid for Engels
title: Celtic turn down Forest's £17m bid for Engels
content: Celtic reject a bid of about £17m from Nottingham Forest for Belgium midfielder Arne Engels.
